mapper.sql: license_plates, driver_name, operation_num, up_online_time, order_time, service_time, online_time, actual_pay, driver_get_pay, driver_out_pay, order_mileage, service_mileage, assign_order_num, contend_order_num, platform_order_num, get_plane_num, out_plane_num, car_team_id, supplier_id, city_id, stat_date, travel_time_start, travel_mileage_start, travel_time, travel_mileage, travel_time_end, travel_mileage_end,forced_time
mapper.select:
select r.id id, , t.team_name teamName, r.driver_id, (select team_name from car_driver_team tt,car_relate_group gg where tt.id = gg.group_id and gg.driver_id = r.driver_id limit 1) as groupName from driver_daily_report r left join car_driver_team t on t.id = r.car_team_id where 1=1
and license_plates like '${licensePlates}%'
and driver_name like '${driverName}%'
and r.driver_id in (${driverIds})
and car_team_id in (${teamIds})
and supplier_id in (${suppliers})
and city_id in (${cities})
and stat_date >= #{statDateStart}
and stat_date <= #{statDateEnd}
ORDER BY stat_date, driver_id desc
ORDER BY ${sortName},driver_id ${sortOrder}

select r.id id, license_plates, r.driver_id, driver_name, sum(operation_num) operation_num, min(up_online_time) up_online_time, sum(forced_time) forcedTime, sum(order_time) order_time, sum(service_time) service_time, sum(online_time) online_time, sum(actual_pay) actual_pay, sum(driver_get_pay) driver_get_pay, sum(driver_out_pay) driver_out_pay, sum(order_mileage) order_mileage, sum(travel_mileage) travel_mileage, sum(service_mileage) service_mileage, sum(assign_order_num) assign_order_num, sum(contend_order_num) contend_order_num, sum(platform_order_num) platform_order_num, sum(get_plane_num) get_plane_num, sum(out_plane_num) out_plane_num, car_team_id, supplier_id, city_id, max(stat_date) stat_date, min(stat_date) statDateStart, max(stat_date) statDateEnd, sum(travel_time_start) travel_time_start, sum(travel_mileage_start) travel_mileage_start, sum(travel_time) travel_time, sum(travel_time_end) travel_time_end, sum(travel_mileage_end) travel_mileage_end, t.team_name teamName, (select team_name from car_driver_team tt,car_relate_group gg where tt.id = gg.group_id and gg.driver_id = r.driver_id limit 1) as groupName from driver_daily_report r left join car_driver_team t on t.id = r.car_team_id where 1=1
and license_plates like '${licensePlates}%'
and driver_name like '${driverName}%'
and driver_id in (${driverIds})
and car_team_id in (${teamIds})
and supplier_id in (${suppliers})
and city_id in (${cities})
and stat_date >= #{statDateStart}
and stat_date <= #{statDateEnd}
group by driver_id
ORDER BY stat_date, driver_id desc
ORDER BY ${sortName},driver_id ${sortOrder}
